title: Johann Lamont – 2013 Speech to Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Johann Lamont, the Leader of the Scottish Labour Party, to the 2013 Labour Party conference.
content:
Conference, I am delighted to be here and honoured to address you as Scottish Labour Leader in these challenging times for people in Scotland and across the UK.
